Subjects: Easter; Passion, exhortation to worship by; Christ, Passion of; Cross, feast of the Exaltation of
_description: A verse insert in a prose text on Adam and Melchisedech — 18 lines

Bod423.First Lines:
Heil þou festful dayþat puttist oure woundes
                    away…
Bod423.Last Lines:
…The þeef on cristis rith handherd ful good
                    tytand
Bod423.Editions:
Mills,  C. A.,
                        ed.  
             John Capgrave’s Solace of Pilgrimes, c. 1450.
         London, New York: H. Frowde, 1911: 160.
